title: Moondeer's Plausible Analytics
description: Plausible Analytics script injection plus a page for toggling visit exclusion.

fields.label: Script Extensions
fields.placeholder: Optional extensions to include when fetching Plausible script (i.e. hash.exclusions.outbound-link) (default is '')

fields.label: Script Name
fields.placeholder: Optional script name without script extensions aside from '.js' (i.e. Cloudflare worker expecting 'script.js') (default is 'plausible.js')

fields.label: Script Source
fields.placeholder: Optional script source (i.e. Cloudflare worker such as 'https://your-worker-name.your-cloudflare-username.workers.dev/js/') (default is 'https://plausible.io/js/')
